item.title: About Me
item.description: 👨‍💻 Experience Software Engineer Intern @ Homebase (Y-Combinator) ▪ Tech Stack: Javascript, React.js, MongoDB, Express, Node.js. ▪ Date: 06/2023 - Present. ▪ Location: Singapore (Remote). Responsibilities ▪ Designed and built the property listing website with JavaScript, PostgreSQL, Strapi CMS, and Next.js to save 40% development costs. ▪ Established CI/CD and AWS infrastructure utilizing Amplify, S3, RDS, and EC2. ▪ Engaged in the full Agile cycle including daily stand‑ups, sprint reviews, sprint plannings, and retrospectives.
